entries.name: Overview
entries: You were kicked out of your apprenticeship after an experiment gone haywire, having lost a leg in the process. After that event you spent the money and resources you saved building a prototype of a mechanized exoskeleton. That prototype awarded you your first patent, the Talos Mini TitanÂ®. With this accomplishment you decided to travel to Boreain to make a name for yourself helping with Vrukre's war against Ilifir and the advanced technology they are rumored to be using.

entries.name: Feature: Supply Chain
entries: From your time as an apprentice you have learned how to make connections with wholesalers, suppliers, and other merchants and entrepreneurs. You can use that knowledge when establishing your business or searching for items, supplies, and information.
